execution_quality: Agent provided no analysis or troubleshooting steps; user identified the solution independently and pivoted to domain configuration.
work_category: Troubleshooting email delivery issues in signup flow, with user reorienting toward configuring email domain settings.
summary: Agent provided no assistance with tracing missing signup emails. The user self-diagnosed the root cause (unverified email domain) and identified the solution (switch to verified dev.hnst.sh domain), but required implementation help that the agent did not provide.
follow_up_pattern: User determined a specific fix is needed: switching email domain to dev.hnst.sh which is the only verified domain, indicating readiness to implement a configuration change.
